wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Thomas (1959 - 20 October 2008)  was an international relations academic and a leading authority on the politics of development. Her work In Search of Security was an early contribution to the 'widening' debate within security studies.

response: A Century of Cinema is a 1994 American documentary film directed by Caroline Thomas about the art of filmmaking (coinciding with cinema's 100th anniversary), containing numerous interviews with some of the most influential film personalities of the 20th century.
